result.execSummary:
Jessica L Mroz was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jessica L Mroz was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jessica L Mroz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jessica L Mroz in court with attorney Kasey Grams.  Defendant Jessica L Mroz in custody.  John M. O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF424 and 15CF464 called.

15CF464 Defendant waives extradition.  Defendant and Court sign Waiver of Extradition.

15CF424 Sentencing Hearing
No corrections to PSI.  Argument by State.  Argument by Attorney Grams.  Defendant relates.  Court relates and orders:

SW - 3 years Probation
Must follow through with the programming she has started in the jail
Must finish her BA or Associates Degree
Must remain absolutely sober
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages
Must not possess or consume controlled substances or drug paraphernalia
Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent
107 days jail - Credit for 107 days
Court costs
Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge

Order for DNA given to the defendant's attorney in court who said she would bring it to the jail.

Clerked by WH. 
Defendant Jessica L Mroz in court with attorney Kasey Grams.  Defendant Jessica L Mroz in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
This  covers 15CF424, 15CF464.

15CF464   Extradition   State requests 30 more days.     Court hearing  1-05-2016 @ 10:30AM

15CF424   Arraignment;  Guilty plea;  Plea agreement;   Defendant pleads no contest to count 1;   The Court finds plea is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given and finds the defendant Guilty.  Factual basis found.  

Bond is Revoked.

PSI ordered. 



FAX JAIL


  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.
Defendant must not have contact with Turtle Lake Casino.
Must not leave the State of Wisconsin without Court's permission.

THIS BOND COVERS 15CF424 & 15CF464.

Defendant Jessica L Mroz in court with attorney Kasey Grams (telephonically).  Defendant Jessica L Mroz in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
